mapper.update: update category set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, topic_img_id = #{topicImgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, topic_img_id, delete_time, description, update_time from category
